org.ctoolkit.restapi.client

Interface ListRetrievalRequest<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the list item resource type
    All Superinterfaces:
    Request<List<T>>, RetrievalRequest<List<T>>

    public interface ListRetrievalRequest<T>
extends RetrievalRequest<List<T>>
    The extended Request to provide retrieval specific API to work with list of resources.
    Author:
    Aurel Medvegy

      • finish

        List<T> finish(@Nonnull
             RequestCredential credential)
        Execute a remote call to find the list of resources of given type with request specific credential and configuration.

        Note: The underlying API must support (at least partially) this functionality otherwise these properties will be ignored and default value of target API will be used.

        Specified by:
        finish in interface Request<List<T>>
        Parameters:
        credential - the credential and configuration to be applied to this request
        Returns:
        the resource as a result of the remote call

      • finish

        List<T> finish(int start,
             int length)
        Execute a remote call to find filtered list of resources.
        Parameters:
        start - the position of the first result, numbered from 0
        length - the maximum number of results to retrieve
        Returns:
        the list of filtered resources, if none returns empty list
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - thrown for any negative numbers

      • finish

        List<T> finish(@Nullable
             Map<String,Object> criteria)
        Execute a remote call to find the list of resources of given type and additional filtering criteria.
        Specified by:
        finish in interface Request<List<T>>
        Parameters:
        criteria - the optional filtering criteria map
        Returns:
        the list of resources matching filtering criteria, otherwise returns empty list

             Locale locale)
        Execute a remote call to find the list of resources with specified locale.

        Parameters:

      • orderBy

        ListRetrievalRequest<T> orderBy(@Nullable
                              String property)
        Order the result based on the given property name. If not set, the underlying API a default value (if any) will be applied. The underlying API must support sorting functionality, otherwise will be ignored.
        Parameters:
        property - the resource property name used to sort the result
        Returns:
        this request to chain calls

      • sortAscending

        ListRetrievalRequest<T> sortAscending(boolean ascending)
        Sort the result either ascending or descending for given property by orderBy(String). If not set, the underlying API a default value (if any) will be applied. The underlying API must support sorting functionality, otherwise will be ignored.
        Parameters:
        ascending - true to sort the result ascending
        Returns:
        this request to chain calls
